select wpd.id, wpd.url, wpd.domain, wpd.title, wpd.author, wpd.keyword, case when wpd.content is null then null else case when char_length(wpd.content)>100 then substring(wpd.content, 1, 100) else substring(wpd.content, 1) end end content, wps1.resource_url videoUrl, wps2.resource_url imgUrl from search_crawler.web_page_detail wpd left join search_crawler.web_page_resource wps1 on wpd.id=wps1.url_detail_id and wps1.resource_type=1 left join search_crawler.web_page_resource wps2 on wpd.id=wps2.url_detail_id and wps2.resource_type=2
wpd.domain = #{input1}
wpd.title like concat('%',#{input1},'%')
wpd.title like concat('%',#{input1},'%')
and
or
wpd.domain = #{input2}
wpd.title like concat('%',#{input2},'%')
wpd.title like concat('%',#{input2},'%')
and
wpd.domain != #{input2}
wpd.title not like concat('%',#{input2},'%')
wpd.title not like concat('%',#{input2},'%')
and
or
wpd.domain = #{input3}
wpd.title like concat('%',#{input3},'%')
wpd.title like concat('%',#{input3},'%')
and

wpd.title not like concat('%',#{input3},'%')
